comment.body: 我看不了，显示视频不支持，大家都能看到吗？
其它的电影，MV好多可以看的，速度还不错！
It looks great and intersting and I want to try it out , but unfortunately I can't access the github website ! Because It's blocked by china's GFW , I can't install it in linux .
@Sksn: It's nice , thanks a lot for your help.

@Sksn: I download it from ZeroUp finaly, it's so cool that you made a AppImage format application, but when I run it, I got this error message,I have tried it in 2 linux distro ,but the same error.                               
```
/tmp/.mount_beakerib5Uuo/app/beaker-browser: error while loading shared libraries: /tmp/.mount_beakerib5Uuo/app/libnode.so: cannot read file data: Error 103
```
